definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: son-in-law of Saul (appar. Aram. name, my help is God = Heb. [[עַזְרִיאֵל]] q.v.; so Ne:Am. Jour. Sem. Lang, xiii (1897), 173 HPS cf. Gray:Prop. N. 309; cf. OAram. [[יעדראל]] ClGann:J As, 1883, Eev.-Mar., 139, No.13);—1Sa 18:19 (LXX A Ihl, LXXL Edrihl), 2Sa 21:8 (LXX Serei, A Esdri, LXXL Ezri).
